sentence: Anti-corruption Promotion No one will dare to be corrupt No one is able to be corrupt No one wants to be corruptAnti-fraud responsibilities of Audit and Internal Control Center Investigate fraud cases; Submit handling opinions and report to the mana-gement, the Board of Directors and the Board of Supervisors; Engage all functional departments and subsidiaries in annual fraud risk assessment and self-assessment; Accept whistleblows on fraud; Publish anti-fraud prevention.

It is a systematic training plan designed by Feihe for the management trainees, which supports and guides them with a four-step four force model; in the process, trainees are able to find out their own positioning and strengthen skills through practice projects.
